title: lost ranked game because of "UNABLE TO CONNECT TO GAME"
body: this is the second time now. after champ select the league client disconnects when MY INTERNET IS WORKING. i tried relogging in. but wait! I CANT RECONNECT INTO THE GAME. my team remakes and I LOST my LP. what a mess.

replies.body: It sounds like you were affected by the short login issues we had earlier. The main problem seemed to have been coming from problems with Charter Spectrum as our players mentioned. Most of the troubles look like they've cleared out, but please hit me up in a comment [**over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/EdHm3dWu-105-unable-to-loginstuck-at-authenticating) if you still can't get logged in.
seems a bunch of people including us are having this issue
